description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. How long will you last in the zombie apocolypse? Scavenge, craft and fight to survive. Play solo or in a network game with up to 8 players. With PvE and PvP game modes.
